bits.name: enabled
bits.description: Apply QZSS SLAS DGNSS corrections: Enabled (1) / Disabled (0)

bits.name: test
bits.description: Use QZSS SLAS data when in test mode (SLAS msg 0): Use data anyhow (1) / Ignore data when in Test Mode (0)

bits.name: raim
bits.description: Raim out measurements that are not corrected by QZSS SLAS, if at least 5 measurements are corrected: Enabled (1) / Disabled (0)

adjudication.reasoning: The extraction matches the official u-blox M8 protocol specification for the UBX-CFG-SLAS message. The payload length of 4 bytes, bitfield definitions for the mode byte, and the subsequent 3-byte reserved field are all accurately captured according to the documentation for this receiver generation.
